title: React Library
description: Add qwikified React components as a separate library

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the library?

directory.description: A directory where the lib is placed.

installMUIExample.description: Add dependencies for Material UI and qwikified example component, that uses it

targetApps.description: The names of the applications that should be configured to work with react components.
targetApps.x-prompt: What apps are you going to use this integration with? (Comma delimited, leave empty for none)

linter.description: The tool to use for running lint checks.

unitTestRunner.description: Test runner to use for unit tests.

tags.description: Add tags to the library (used for linting).

importPath.description: The library name used to import it, like `@myorg/my-awesome-lib`.

strict.description: Whether to enable `tsconfig` strict mode or not.

storybookConfiguration.description: Whether to include storybook configuration for the generated library.
